name: Return of the World
desc:
If this card is activated: Banish 1 Ritual Monster from your Deck. You can send this card to the GY, then activate 1 of these effects;
● Tribute 1 monster from your hand or field, or shuffle 1 Ritual Monster from your GY into the Deck, whose Level equals or exceeds the Level of the Ritual Monster banished by this card's effect, then Ritual Summon that banished Ritual Monster. You must be able to Ritual Summon to activate and to resolve this effect.
● Add the monster banished by this card's effect to your hand.
You can only use 1 "Return of the World" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
str2: Add the banished monster to hand
